original: Ericson, Johannes Mattias, läroverksadjunkt, Kinna, f. 10/7/01 i Kin-narumma, Älvsb. k, av lagerbokhåll. Carl E. o. Elma Eriksson. G. 32 m. Alice Andersson. Barn: Lars-Göran f. 35. — Stud:ex. i Borås 22, fil. kand. i Lund 28, folksk :lär :ex. i Växjö 31. Vik. adj. o. e. lär. v, Härnösands h. a. 1. 31-34, ämneslär. v. Emmaboda komm. mellansk. 35-38, dito v. Kinna samrealsk. sed. 46. Led. av styr. f. HSB i Kinna sed. 44. Hobiby: cykelfärder.
translated: Ericson, Johannes Mattias, high school teacher, Kinna, b. 10/7/01 in Kin-narumma, Älvsborg county, son of warehouse keeper Carl E. and Elma Eriksson. Married in 1932 to Alice Andersson. Children: Lars-Göran b. 1935. Studied at Borås graduating class in 1922, graduated from Lund University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1928, and received a teaching degree for elementary school in Växjö in 1931. Temporary teacher and teacher's assistant at Härnösands higher secondary school from 1931 to 1934, subject teacher in Emmaboda 35-38, and in Kinna secondary school from 1946. Member of the board of HSB (Housing Association) in Kinna since 1944. Hobbies: cycling.
